title: Services & Pricing Page
description:
Build Comprehensive Services and Pricing Page

Create a dedicated services page that clearly communicates available service tiers, pricing, and the client engagement process through an organized, card-based layout.

Requirements:

Hero Section:
- Create compelling headline that communicates value proposition
- Include brief overview of services offered
- Add supporting imagery or visual elements
- Ensure responsive design across all device sizes

Pricing Tier Cards:
- Design 2-3 distinct pricing tier cards with visual hierarchy
- Starter tier: approximately $800 (define specific deliverables)
- Professional tier: approximately $1,500 (define specific deliverables)
- Premium tier: $2,500+ (define specific deliverables)
- Highlight recommended or most popular tier
- Include clear CTA buttons for each tier

What's Included Checklists:
- Create itemized checklist for each pricing tier
- Use checkmarks or icons for visual clarity
- Clearly differentiate features between tiers
- Show what additional features higher tiers include

Add-ons Pricing Table:
- Design structured table listing optional add-on services
- Include clear pricing for each add-on
- Provide brief description of what each add-on includes
- Make it clear which tiers can access which add-ons

Process Timeline:
- Visualize typical project workflow from start to finish
- Define key phases (e.g., Discovery, Design, Development, Launch)
- Include approximate timeframes for each phase
- Set clear expectations for client involvement

Design Specifications:
- Use consistent card-based layout throughout the page
- Maintain pricing transparency with no hidden costs
- Ensure strong visual hierarchy and readability
- Apply brand colors and typography consistently
- Optimize for mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

Edge Cases to Consider:
- How to handle custom pricing requests
- Display of seasonal promotions or discounts
- Handling of "Contact for pricing" scenarios in Premium tier
- Currency display and international pricing if applicable
